item.title: Sarah add a quote by Aimee Bender
item.description: "My lover is experiencing reverse evolution." -- Aimee Bender

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Earl Lovelace
item.description: "I so love you! It is like my heart wants to be one with yours. I feel it melting inside of me, and like sunshine flowing out through cracks and streaming into your heart." -- Earl Lovelace

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Jim Crace, from The Devil's Larder
item.description: "And one by one-- with her fingers pressed into her flesh, and with her knees spread out to make a rhombus of her legs-- her splinters and her corners were removed and she became a lizard with five limbs, and she became a boomerang, and she became a root." -- Jim Crace, from The Devil's Larder

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "Be what you would seem to be - or, if you'd like it put more simply - never imagine yourself not to be otherwise than what it might appear to others that what you were or might have been was not otherwise than what you had been would have appeared to them to be otherwise." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Samantha Hunt
item.description: "My love for him was -- Tyranny." -- Samantha Hunt
